original_text: And he slew all the priests of the high places that were there upon the altars, and burned men's bones upon them, and returned to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 또 거기 있는 산당의 제사장들을 다 제단 위에서 죽이고 사람의 해골을 제단 위에서 불사르고 예루살렘으로 돌아왔더라

sentences.original_text: And he slew all the priests of the high places
that were there upon the altars
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에 있던 제단 위에 있던 자들을

sentences.original_text: and burned men's bones upon them
